===== Built using DXCore 11.2 =====
=== Introduction ===
This plugin attempts to increase discoverability by creating a new menu 'DXV2' and placing several common CodeRush features on it. 

While the default is to create a new menu, you can also have it reuse the DevExpress menu or specify your own menu if you prefer.

=== Usage ===

Simply select a menu item from the new menu.

Options chosen from this menu will invoke as if triggered via standard shortcut combos.
